thread.section_title: InnoMax Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of InnoMax | innomax.com
thread.title: KEN & KAREN ROWLAND
thread.title_full: InnoMax reviewed by KEN & KAREN ROWLAND

author: KEN & KAREN ROWLAND
title: KEN & KAREN ROWLAND
text:
We were very impressed with our sales person. He was very knowledgeable and helpful on the choosing of the type of mattress we were looking to purchase. The delivery was also exceptional. We will recommend Innomax to anyone looking for an easy and financially affordable way to purchase a mattress.
Thank you.
